product_name: Mountain House Italian Pepper Steak - Single Serving
long_description: Savor real pepper steak with rice on the trail or wherever your adventures take you. It's made with tender cuts of pepper steak, red, green and yellow bell peppers, tomatoes and long-grain rice.
short_description: Savor real pepper steak with rice on the trail or wherever your adventures take you. It's made with tender cuts of pepper steak, red, green and yellow bell peppers, tomatoes and long-grain rice.
